name: @roo-vibecoding/vscode-nightly
description: Nightly build for the Roo Code VSCode extension.

scripts.bundle: pnpm clean && pnpm --filter @roo-vibecoding/build build && node esbuild.mjs
scripts.vsix: pnpm build && cd build && mkdirp ../../../bin && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../../../bin
